channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: King Charles Urges ‘Compassion’ and Finding Strength in Diversity in Annual Christmas Message
item.description: His annual Christmas message was more outward-looking than last year’s, when he focused on the medical workers who had helped him and his daughter-in-...

item.title: The real ping pong champion — and hustler — who inspired 'Marty Supreme'
item.description: Marty Reisman was nicknamed "The Needle" for his slender physique. He dressed well and put on a show.

item.title: Christmas Around the World in Photos
item.description: The holiday spirit is bringing people together, with celebrations of lights, dance and Santa.

item.title: DOJ says it may need a 'few more weeks' to finish releasing Epstein files
item.description: The Justice Department said Wednesday that it may need a "few more weeks" to release its records on the late sex offender Jeffrey Epstein after discov...

item.title: IT meltdowns have grounded planes. What airlines can learn from them
item.description: Alaska Airlines is the latest airline to ground its planes because of an IT meltdown. We talked to industry leaders about why these systems fail and w...

item.title: Pope Leo Makes Christmas Call for Dialogue to Address World’s Conflicts
item.description: Leo XIV’s Christmas address was his first since being elected pontiff and was scrutinized for comparisons with those of his predecessor, Francis.

item.title: A holiday tradition: David Sedaris reads from 'The Santaland Diaries'
item.description: Writer and humorist David Sedaris reads from his holiday essay "The Santaland Diaries."

item.title: Morning Edition hosts play 'Do You Know Your Ho-Ho-Ho!'
item.description: Morning Edition hosts Michel Martin and Leila Fadel answer holiday trivia questions compiled by Southern Living Magazine.

item.title: Why Russia Is Likely to Reject the New US-Ukrainian Peace Plan
item.description: The first draft essentially called for Ukraine’s surrender. The revised version includes the security guarantees Kyiv wants to prevent future Russian ...

item.title: California Storm Floods Roadways and Knocks Out Power on Christmas Day
item.description: Officials warned that travel for holiday celebrations would be hazardous across much of the state, with more than half an inch of rain still to fall i...

item.title: A Top Candidate for Prime Minister Returns to Bangladesh After 17 Years in Exile
item.description: Tarique Rahman, who had managed his party’s political affairs from Britain, is back in his country to campaign in elections.
